definition[0]: used to describe a set of ideas or beliefs whose name ends in ‘ism’, especially when you think that they are not sensible or practical
definition[1]: a political belief or religion based on a particular principle or the ideas and beliefs of a particular person
definition[2]: the action or process of doing something
definition[3]: an action or remark that has a particular quality
definition[4]: the state of being like something or someone, or having a particular quality
definition[5]: illness caused by too much of something
definition[6]: the practice of treating people unfairly because of something
example[7]: sexism  (=making unfair differences between men and women)
